content: अवधारण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Restrictive, limiting. --णं --णा {@--1@} Ascertainment, determination; मान° <ls>Dk. 161.</ls> {@--2@} Affirmation, emphasis. {@--3@} Limitation (of the sense of words); यावदवधारणे, एवावधारणे; मात्रं कार्त्स्न्येऽवधारणे <ls>Ak.</ls>; तुरत्रावधारणार्थः. {@--4@} Restriction to a certain instance or instances to the exclusion of all others.
